participant_1.name: Jasmine
participant_1.personality: Energetic and creative, always looking for new ways to express myself.
participant_1.background: I love how the rhythm of hip hop beats can get my whole body moving. I enjoy playing retro video games on my 386. I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit. In my free time, I enjoy cloud watching. I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Dependable and thoughtful, I prioritize family and enjoy nostalgia.
participant_2.background: I work long hours to support my family. I met the creators of my favorite comic book series at a comic con in Russia. I have a collection of video games. I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade. I remember helping my mom bake cupcakes in the kitchen when I was a kid.

content.text: Pretty good, I'm just working on some art. What are you up to?
I'm just playing some video games.
Cool, what games do you like?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorites are probably the Mario games.
Oh, I love Mario games too! I've been playing a lot of Super Mario Odyssey lately.
Me too! That game is so good. I love the new capture mechanic.
Yeah, it's really cool. I love being able to control other characters in the game.
I know, right? It's so much fun.
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to read, watch movies, and go rollerblading.
Cool, I like to read and watch movies too. I've never been rollerblading, though.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and have fun at the same time.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
